pageTitle: Ion : Action Bar Mods : World of Warcraft AddOns
textBeforeTable: Optional Files (8) - beta release for patch 5.0.4 Hydrogen-1 Beta -Moved localization to one file -Blizzard ExtraAction button should now only show if the Blizzard Bar is used -Tentatively enabling/disabling of the Blizzard Main Bar should work -Now scans profession spells Hydrogen-2 Beta - Sorry folks, that is all :( - Other minor changes - Fixed extra bar action ID - Dual spec toggle should work now - Fixed texture issue - Updated for patch 5.1 Hydrogen-2 Beta Hydorgen-3 - flyout should show the proper spell - spell cooldowns should update (trash, symbiosis, disconnect/reconnect after a spec change should not show questionmark anymore) - spells with distinct subtypes between specs should be shown as useable in all cases. - GetSpellCount replaced by GetSpellCharges (roll charges issues) - should now display the appropriate tooltip in all cases. - Forum version, include most hotfixes appearing on the forum (flyx, Nephyrin, chinoloco,kouik) Hydrogen-4 - Spell Charges fix properly implemented - Spell Count bug fix (i.e. Death Knight's Scent of Blood count update) Hydrogen-5
